snippet.title: GREAT GOD GROVE - ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: Steam: https://bit.ly/GreatGodGroveLL

GOODNESS GREY-SHEETS! Get ready to gossip, grovekeep and godboss in Great God Grove, the new game from LimboLane, the developers of the beloved indie hit Smile For Me! 

It’s the end of da whole dang world, and the best-est god has gone crazy! As the mail carrier in a world of humans, deities, and freaks, only you have the power of communication to save the day!

Every generation, the gods come together to postpone the apocalypse. But this time, it’s HEAVENLY CHAOS!! The once-beloved god of communication started a bunch of godly fights and then went awol. With King missing and the gods in disarray, who’s gonna shut the Great Rift in the sky and save the world from da A-POCKY-LIPS???

FEATURES

📨 Wield your TRUSTY MEGAPON! As the gods’ new mail-carrier, suck up lines of dialogue with your mail-cannon and launch them back to solve puzzles.
🎭 Meet 60 CHARACTERS! Listen to their woes and wonders, then deliver key messages to solve their problems – or just to see how they’ll react!
🌄 Discover BIZARRE GODS! The god of TEAMWORK? The god of LOVE SONGS? Jeez, who’s in charge around here…?

ABOUT LIMBOLANE
LimboLane is a creative duo making silly games that squish and bounce, comprised of designer Day Lane and animator Yugo Limbo. They have a love for the kitschy, the surreal, and the utterly bizarre. Their nod-and-shake adventure game Smile For Me was self-published on Steam in 2019 and re-released for consoles in 2023.

DEVELOPED BY LIMBOLANE, AND PUBLISHED BY LIMBOLANE AND FELLOW TRAVELLER
Limbolane Games Twitter: https://twitter.com/LimboLaneGames
Limbolane Website: https://www.limbolane.com/
